com.newatlanta.nio.file
Interface CopyOption

All Known Implementing Classes:
LinkOption, StandardCopyOption
public interface CopyOption

An object that configures how to copy or move a file.

Objects of this type may be used with the copyTo and moveTo methods to configure how a file is copied or moved.

The StandardCopyOption enumeration type defines the standard options.

Since:
1.7
